articles.title: CBI Raids On Manish Sisodia Over Delhi Liquor Policy End After 14 Hours
articles.description: Manish Sisodia, Delhi's Deputy Chief Minister who also handles the Excise department, was raided by the CBI today over allegations of corruption in the liquor policy. The Aam Aadmi Party government has denied the allegations.

articles.title: 3,500 kg Explosives, 7 am Evacuation: How Noida Towers Will Be Demolished
articles.description: It's all set. The date is locked. The gunpowder is ready. Residents have been asked to stay away as the Supertech's 40-storey Noida twin towers will be demolished at 2.30 pm on August 28.
articles.content:

articles.title: Partha Chatterjee was cancer, had to be removed: Trinamool leader
articles.description: Partha Chatterjee was arrested by the Enforcement Directorate in July for his alleged involvement in Bengal’s teacher recruitment scam. Following his arrest, Mamata Banerjee sacked him from all posts and ousted him from the party.

articles.title: Two pilots flying at 37,000 feet fall asleep, miss runway to land
articles.description: Flight ET-343 continued following the route planned by the Flight Management Computer, without, however, descending. Air traffic controllers tried to contact the pilots several times but did not receive a response. | World News
